SELECT ii.item_id, ii.item_name, iv.item_sKU, ib.item_brand_name, ii.item_price, ii.sales, ii.refund_num, ii.item_price*ii.sales AS salesMoney FROM item_info ii LEFT JOIN item_value iv ON ii.item_id=iv.item_id LEFT JOIN item_brand ib ON ii.item_brand_id=ib.item_brand_id
ii.item_name LIKE '%${itemName}%'
AND ii.item_id LIKE '%${itemId}%'
AND iv.item_sKU LIKE '%${itemSKU}%'
AND ib.item_brand_name LIKE '%${itemBrandName}%'
GROUP BY iv.item_sKU
ORDER BY ii.created DESC
ORDER BY ii.sales DESC
ORDER BY ii.refund_num DESC
LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM item_info ii LEFT JOIN item_value iv ON ii.item_id=iv.item_id LEFT JOIN item_brand ib ON ii.item_brand_id=ib.item_brand_id
ii.item_name LIKE '%${itemName}%'
AND ii.item_id LIKE '%${itemId}%'
AND iv.item_sKU LIKE '%${itemSKU}%'
AND ib.item_brand_name LIKE '%${itemBrandName}%'
GROUP BY iv.item_sKU ) AS a
